resources.string: The main rule is that to defeat, you must destroy at least one main figure which calls - Sortek:
As you can see, you have exactly the same figure. This figure can not moving, and, each Sortek, will bring its owner some income per move.
Now, let’s try to destroy the enemy figure using your Soldier figure:
Click at this figure and then select a desired cell.
Destroy the enemy’s Sortek figure to win and continue.
Now, let’s try your forces in a real battle!
